title: Texas Instruments | SDE1 | 2024 | Bangalore, India
content:
**Education:** B.Tech in Computer Science (Tier-1)
**Years of Experience:** 0 (Fresh Graduate)  
**Prior Experience:** Internship at Gap Inc.  
**Date of the Offer:** August, 2024 (6M + FTE)
**Company:** Texas Instruments 
**Title/Level:** Software Development Engineer
**Location:** Bangalore, India
**Salary:** ₹1,925,000 per year  
**Relocation/Signing Bonus:** 
- ₹75,000 (Relocation Bonus)  
- ₹300,000 (Signing Bonus upon joining)  
- ₹200,000 (Bonus payable after 12 months)  

**Stock Bonus:** $10,000 in Restricted Stock Units (RSUs)  
**Performance Bonus:** Profit-sharing up to 20% of annual salary, potentially ₹385,000  
**Total Compensation (Salary + Bonus + Stock):** ₹3,022,835 + $10,000  
**Benefits:**  
- Comprehensive insurance coverage (medical, personal accident, life)  
- Gratuity as per regulations  
- Professional development allowance: ₹10,000 annually  
- ESPP (Employee Stock Purchase Plan) with a 15% discount  
- Subsidized transport and free shuttle services  
- Temporary **accommodation for 2 weeks** upon joining  
- Generous leave policies, including privilege leave, sick leave, and parental leave
- Support for education assistance and adoption reimbursement
